channel.title: Universal server,317,item
channel.description:
Hello! I'm quite new programming java,but I'm learning quickly basic stuff.. Now about the server i am using soulsplit source for base*the one with ssp* im not trying to make some superhyper server,just to have fun and learn basic of java
anyways ,so far iv added ::item axe hunt (with picklock and aggro mobs) removed stalls from home changed exp rate for all skills added different command for admins to pickup changed some items reqs.
not added yet,but would like to pirate ship pirate house remove npc clip(much harder then i can take on right now,i think) 100% Falador and Varrock some quests edit quest tab for commands a decent clan chat skillcapes and much more i cant think about now ;) fixing lot of bugs
Progress 21.08 - added pirate house&ship + dungeon in wilderness ~50
Anyways my server is up running for beta testing,u can chek it up @serverlist. I am looking for a second coder to help me out(can be as noob as me) :) universalserver@hotmail.com is the msn to apply to code
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/755147/pilt6.JPG[/img]
Thank you for reading my topic , hannes

item.title: Universal server,317,item
item.dc:creator: @Ineverbow Ineverbow
item.description:
@Ineverbow wrote:

Hello!
I’m quite new programming java,but I’m learning quickly basic stuff…
Now about the server
i am using soulsplit source for basethe one with ssp
im not trying to make some superhyper server,just to have fun and learn basic of java

anyways ,so far iv added
::item
axe hunt (with picklock and aggro mobs)
removed stalls from home
changed exp rate for all skills
added different command for admins to pickup
changed some items reqs.

not added yet,but would like to
pirate ship
pirate house
remove npc clip(much harder then i can take on right now,i think)
100% Falador and Varrock
some quests
edit quest tab for commands
a decent clan chat
skillcapes
and much more i cant think about now
fixing lot of bugs

Progress
21.08 - added pirate house&ship + dungeon in wilderness ~50

Anyways my server is up running for beta testing,u can chek it up @serverlist.
I am looking for a second coder to help me out(can be as noob as me)
universalserver@hotmail.com is the msn to apply to code

Thank you for reading my topic , hannes
